committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Parks, Historic Preservation, and Recreation

official_title: A bill to improve the administration of the Women's Rights National Historical Park in the State of New York, and for other purposes.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Provides for the addition of specified parcels of land and dwellings to (and deletion of the Bloomer House from) the Women's Rights National Historical Park in New York. Authorizes additional appropriations for the Park for land acquisition and development.

titles.title: A bill to improve the administration of the Women's Rights National Historical Park in the State of New York, and for other purposes.
